img_summary: The image depicts "Fire Date," an uncommon ingredient in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is likely used for crafting or enhancing abilities within the game. Based on the context, Fire Date can be found in "The Webbed Hollow" and beyond, aligning with other ingredients in the list that are tied to specific locations and enemies. The image serves to visually represent the item for players to identify it in-game.
